name: Gym Empire
summary: Gym Empire is a gym simulation and management game. You take on the role of a personal trainer trying to make ends meet training clients in your garage. Build your way up to number one on the block, the city, the country and the world by building your Gym Empire how you want. Will you make a commercial gym or specialise in a certain field? Will you focus on training clients yourself or hire staff to train clients while you focus on managing your Gym Empire? The choice is yours.
